title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1851.2 - Appearances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1851.2 - Appearances

State Regulations
(a) All attorneys, other thanthose whose representation has been noted by a
pleading, must file a noticeof appearance and authorization to
appear. (b) Substitutions of attorney. No subsequent attorney representing a party will be
permittedto appear unless there is filed with the clerk a consent to the change
signedby the retiring attorney and signed and acknowledged by the
party. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1851.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
